mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ward.ward_name, ward.ward_id, car.car_id, car.car_no, car.car_name, de.device_serial, de.device_id FROM IS_WARDCAR AS car INNER JOIN IS_WARD AS ward ON car.ward_id = ward.ward_id LEFT JOIN VL_DEVICE_INFO AS de ON car.car_id = de.car_id WHERE car.car_no = #{car_no} AND car.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY de.entry_datetime DESC ) AS t LIMIT 1
SELECT de.device_id, de.p_camera_id, de.d_camera_id, de.f_camera_id, de.p_url, de.d_url, wowza_url FROM VL_DEVICE_INFO AS de WHERE de.device_serial = #{device_serial} LIMIT 1

SELECT ems_id, epn_id FROM ( SELECT distinct on (ems_id) ems_id, epn_id , proc_cd FROM VL_EMS_EVENT AS vee INNER JOIN IS_WARDCAR AS car ON car.car_id = vee.car_id WHERE car.car_no = #{car_no} AND car.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY ems_id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS info WHERE info.proc_cd not in ('00','02','03','04')

SELECT ems_id, epn_id, case when proc_cd = '02' then '이송종료' when proc_cd = '04' then '이송취소' else '미이송' end as proc_nm, stat_start_dtime, stat_end_dtime FROM ( SELECT distinct on (ems_id) ems_id, epn_id , proc_cd,stat_start_dtime, stat_end_dtime FROM VL_EMS_EVENT AS vee INNER JOIN IS_WARDCAR AS car ON car.car_id = vee.car_id WHERE car.car_no = #{car_no} AND car.use_yn = 'Y' and vee.stat_start_dtime > to_char(now() - '1 hour'::interval, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') ORDER BY ems_id DESC ) AS info WHERE info.proc_cd in ('02','03','04')

SELECT ems_id, epn_id FROM ( SELECT distinct on (ems_id) ems_id, epn_id , proc_cd FROM VL_EMS_EVENT AS vee INNER JOIN IS_WARDCAR AS car ON car.car_id = vee.car_id WHERE car.car_no = #{car_no} AND car.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY ems_id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS info WHERE info.proc_cd in ('00')

SELECT ems_id, epn_id FROM ( SELECT distinct on (ems_id) ems_id, epn_id , proc_cd FROM VL_EMS_EVENT AS vee INNER JOIN IS_WARDCAR AS car ON car.car_id = vee.car_id WHERE car.car_no = #{car_no} AND car.use_yn = 'Y' --and vee.stat_start_dtime > to_char(now() - '1 hour'::interval, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') ORDER BY ems_id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS info WHERE info.proc_cd not in ('02','03','04')

SELECT ems_id, epn_id, device_serial FROM ( SELECT distinct on (ems_id) ems_id, epn_id , proc_cd, vdi.device_serial FROM VL_EMS_EVENT AS vee INNER JOIN IS_WARDCAR AS car ON car.car_id = vee.car_id INNER JOIN vl_device_info as vdi on vee.car_id = vdi.car_id WHERE car.car_no = #{car_no} AND car.use_yn = 'Y' AND vee.proc_cd = #{b_event} ORDER BY ems_id DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS info

UPDATE VL_DEVICE_INFO SET p_camera_id = #{p_camera_id}, d_camera_id = #{d_camera_id}, f_camera_id = #{f_camera_id}, p_url = #{p_url}, d_url = #{d_url}, wowza_url = #{wowza_url}, entry_datetime = to_char(now(), 'yyyymmddhh24miss') WHERE device_serial = #{device_serial}
mapper.select: SELECT 'patient' as type, 'rtsp://211.246.70.12:1935/live/'||vee.ems_id||'_'||vdi.p_camera_id as url --'rtsp://211.246.70.12:1935/live/2020112712345_camera1' as url FROM VL_DEVICE_INFO AS vdi INNER JOIN VL_EMS_EVENT as vee on vee.device_id = vdi.device_id WHERE vee.ems_id = #{ems_id} and (vdi.p_camera_id !='' and vdi.p_camera_id is not null) and vee.proc_cd not in ('02','03','04') union all SELECT 'defibrillator' as type, 'rtsp://211.246.70.12:1935/live/'||vee.ems_id||'_'||vdi.d_camera_id as url --'rtsp://211.246.70.12:1935/live/2020112712345_camera2' as url FROM VL_DEVICE_INFO AS vdi INNER JOIN VL_EMS_EVENT as vee on vee.device_id = vdi.device_id WHERE vee.ems_id = #{ems_id} and (vdi.d_camera_id !='' and vdi.d_camera_id is not null) and vee.proc_cd not in ('02','03','04') union all SELECT 'field' as type, 'rtsp://211.246.70.12:1935/live/'||vee.ems_id||'_'||vdi.f_camera_id as url --'rtsp://211.246.70.12:1935/live/2020112712345_camera3' as url FROM VL_DEVICE_INFO AS vdi INNER JOIN VL_EMS_EVENT as vee on vee.device_id = vdi.device_id WHERE vee.ems_id = #{ems_id} and (vdi.f_camera_id !='' and vdi.f_camera_id is not null) and vee.proc_cd not in ('02','03','04')
